snippet: The British prime minister suggested that a review of military capabilities should focus on emerging threats, including terrorism and cyberattacks.
abstract: British Prime Min David Cameron, days after his government committed to hit NATO spending targets, urges military to spend more on fighting Islamic State.
lead_paragraph: The British prime minister suggested that a review of military capabilities should focus on emerging threats, including terrorism and cyberattacks.

headline.main: Cameron Urges British Military to Spend More to Tackle ISIS
headline.print_headline: British Premier Urges Military to Spend More to Fight ISIS

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
